EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
Please CLICK HERE for a PDF advertising a special Primary parents event. You can also find information regarding this event on the class blogs. It would be fantastic to see as many parents there as possible.
Kind regards,
David Laird
Head of Primary
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
